entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
